turkish_example_sentence: Ben güzel bir villa sahip olacaktım ama para yetmedi.
english_example_sentence: I was going to have a beautiful villa but the money was not enough.
russian_example_sentence: Я собирался иметь красивую виллу, но денег не хватило.
